pullRequest.body:
from the valuative criterion project

Co-authored-by: Yaël Dillies
Co-authored-by: Javier López-Contreras

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

### PR summary [d83e14c32c](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/19012/commits/d83e14c32cae83cf8579dfaa7f4428981a4051fb)

Import changes exceeding 2%

| %      | File |
| -      | -    |
| +21.18% | `Mathlib.RingTheory.LocalRing.RingHom.Basic` |

<details><summary>

#### Import changes for modified files

</summary>

Dependency changes

| File | Base Count | Head Count | Change |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mathlib.RingTheory.LocalRing.RingHom.Basic | 949 | 1150 | +201 (+21.18%) |


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.RingTheory.RingHom.Integral`|8|
| `Mathlib.Geometry.Manifold.Sheaf.LocallyRingedSpace`|11|
| `Mathlib.Algebra.Category.Ring.LinearAlgebra`|63|
| `Mathlib.Topology.Sheaves.CommRingCat`|119|
|<details><summary>4 files</summary> `Mathlib.Geometry.RingedSpace.PresheafedSpace.Gluing` `Mathlib.Geometry.RingedSpace.OpenImmersion` `Mathlib.Geometry.RingedSpace.LocallyRingedSpace` `Mathlib.Geometry.RingedSpace.LocallyRingedSpace.HasColimits`</details>|149|
| `Mathlib.RingTheory.RingHomProperties` `Mathlib.Algebra.Category.Ring.Constructions`|158|
| `Mathlib.Algebra.Category.Ring.Instances`|177|
| `Mathlib.RingTheory.LocalRing.RingHom.Basic`|201|
| `Mathlib.RingTheory.LocalRing.Subring`|1158|
| `Mathlib.RingTheory.Valuation.LocalSubring`|1374|

</details>

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ IsLocalRing.exists_factor_valuationRing`
`+ LocalSubring`
`+ LocalSubring.exists_le_valuationSubring`
`+ LocalSubring.exists_valuationRing_of_isMax`
`+ LocalSubring.isMax_iff`
`+ LocalSubring.map_maximalIdeal_eq_top_of_isMax`
`+ LocalSubring.mem_of_isMax_of_isIntegral`
`+ ValuationSubring.isMax_toLocalSubring`
`+ ValuationSubring.toLocalSubring`
`+ ValuationSubring.toLocalSubring_injective`
`+ _root_.Algebra.mem_ideal_map_adjoin`
`+ _root_.IsLocalHom.of_surjective`
`+ bijective_rangeRestrict_comp_of_valuationRing`
`+ copy`
`+ instance : Algebra A (ofPrime A P).toSubring := (Subring.inclusion (le_ofPrime A P)).toAlgebra`
`+ instance : IsLocalization.AtPrime (ofPrime A P).toSubring P`
`+ instance : IsScalarTower A (ofPrime A P).toSubring K := .of_algebraMap_eq (fun _ ↦ rfl)`
`+ instance : PartialOrder (LocalSubring R)`
`+ instance [Nontrivial S] (f : R →+* S) (s : Subring R) [IsLocalRing s] : IsLocalRing (s.map f)`
`+ isLocalRing_top`
`+ le_ofPrime`
`+ map`
`+ ofPrime`
`+ ofPrimeEquiv`
`+ range`
`+ toSubring_injective`
`+ toSubring_mono`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
</details>
I feel like it should be fine to import `MaximalIdeal.Basic` into `LocalRing.RingHom.Basic` but I can also inline the proof used to avoid the import.

Or maybe `Function.Surjective.isLocalHom`?
```suggestion
lemma _root_.Function.Surjective.isLocalHom [CommRing R] [CommRing S] [Nontrivial S] [IsLocalRing R]
```
What do you think?

This import feels like it shouldn't appear in a file with this name.
Can you please split the current file into `LocalRing/Subring` and `LocalRing/Valuation`?

pullRequest.title: feat(RingTheory): valuation subrings are maximal local subrings
